P2141 [NOIP2014 普及组] 珠心算测验

Written on December 29th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[1000000];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
    	cin>>a[i];
		}
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(int j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				for(int k=1;k<=n;k++)
				{
					if(a[i]+a[j]==a[k])
					{
						ans++;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
Feel free to share!
